overview: When her celebrity crush publicly announces his engagement and temporary departure from show business, Amy’s long repressed emotions from being left behind resurface and she becomes deeply depressed. To cheer her up, Anne, her younger sister, stages a faux celebrity talk show where her sister can talk about her feelings. It is revealed that Amy’s longing isn’t really because of her celebrity crush but because of their mother’s need to work abroad.
title: Anne's Talkshow
